company_name: Sala Tech Digital Solutions (Cambodia) Co., Ltd
Job Description: We are looking for an experienced mobile developer to join us and lead our mobile development team. As the Mobile Team Lead, you will be responsible for developing the student apps and driving the team to enhance the student journey.In addition to leading the mobile team, you will collaborate with our backend team, product manager, CTO and CEO, and growth team to ensure the products and features that release directly impact the student experience. You will be responsible for testing and checking the mobile app across multiple platforms including, tablets and phones. Actively and consistently support all efforts of the whole team to simplify and enhance the student experience.
Job Requirement: Duties and Responsibilities: - Work closely with top management to set out a vision for the mobile development team- Lead a mobile team in a fast-paced, iterative process- Design and build the advanced application for the Android/iOS platform- Responsible for supervising, managing, and motivating the mobile development team- Maintain the mobile apps, bug fixing, and improve performance- Design the architecture of new products/features- Report the situation and problem to the ManagerRequirements:- Bachelor’s Degree in Information Technology or equivalent in a related field- A minimum of 2 years experience leading a development team- Proficient in Dart and Flutter (Native in Android/iOS is plus)- Understand the deployment/configuration to  Android and iOS- Experience with version control such as Github/Gitlab- Good understanding of computer science concepts, design patterns, algorithms, and data structures- Understanding of UX best practices and a desire to achieve excellent usability- Excellent analytical and problem-solving skills- Strong leadership and people management skills- Helping people get better at their jobs
Company Profile: We created Sala with a simple vision in mind; Enrich students' journey. Over 50,000 graduated high school students annually seek the best fit major and college for their future professional path.Sala is the first university & school information portal, educational opportunities & promotions in Cambodia that empower the high school students to make better college majors and career choices.Through Sala, highschool students in Cambodia can seek advice and guidance, and do the test to find out what might be their best fit major and professional career be. Students can easily access the information, compare, and seek for best offers from each college provider. Moreover, students can receive valuable information and networking to make study an enjoyable experience while connecting them to the right opportunities for their future career.Through Sala, educational institutions can connect and engage with our student community and enable them to manage their academic operations through our school management suite.
Contact Info: Contact Information Socheat Hai HR Manager 855963766172 socheat@sala.co Phnom Penh null 855963766172

company_name: Sala Tech Digital Solutions (Cambodia) Co., Ltd
Job Description: The main responsibility of the Partnership Acquisition Officer is to engage all universities in Cambodia and other institutions to connect with Sala Platform as our partner to allow students can access to the school information portal and enrollment purposes.
Job Requirement: Responsibilities: - Actively approach and hunt new leads via the various website, mobile app, referral networking and connection. - Perform proactive calling to ensure the target of 15 reached calls per day - Making Appointment with potential pipelines to present about SALA’s solution and partnership - Negotiation with potential partners in terms of the fees and other terms condition - Prepare partnership agreement and submit to partner for review - Collect school and university information such as enrollment information, pricing, promotion - Assist partners to set up their accounts on the Sala platform - Keep on track and follow up with all existing pipelines to get the partnership agreement signed - Actively communicate and response to partner via email and other social media channel - Ability to diagnose customer’s challenges and propose the school management system base on their structure - Assist and organize the webinar for Sala as assigned. Requirement:- Minimum 1 year of experience as sale in B2B or partnership / merchant acquisition - Fresh graduated are also encouraged to applied- Experience working in Dean or Any department in university is a plus - Ability to influence other and result-oriented person - High commitment and passion in promoting community base - Great communication and negotiation - Ability to handle multi-tasks and proactive person with can-do-attitude - Good at arrangement and follow up - Very good in English communication both written and spoken

Job Description:
+ Account Management
- Responsible for Group and BU stakeholder management to ensure full understanding of customer requirements including their business goals, targets and directions and promote customer service excellence.
+ Sourcing Management
- Ensures the BU sourcing practices deliver maximum benefit delivery against the category strategies and fulfills business requirements.
+ Supplier Management
- Ensures Supplier Segmentation and Management in the BU is done in line with the Procurement Strategy to drive value from supplier relationships.
+ Functional Management
- To support BU level expenditure and headcount within the agreed budget.
- Responsible for supporting resource plans for the BU procurement teams and finding synergies with the Group.
- Accountable for BUs compliance to group policies and ensure appropriate mitigation actions are in place
- Accountable for BU implementation of Group Procurement Initiatives (Policies, Process / Systems)
- To coach & support a professional and high performing procurement team at the BU level, ensuring the team receive the appropriate training, development and reward needed to deliver the business goals.
Job Requirement:
- A minimum of 8 years experience in managing professional staff and teams to improve performance and service delivery
- Degree holder in Engineering, Business, Commercial or Finance
- Professional Procurement qualifications, such as CIPS (Chartered Institute of Purchasing & Supply) or equivalent country qualification would be an advantage
- Professional knowledge of procurement principles and approach gained through a minimum of 5 years operational experience
- Experience in and knowledge of account management, sourcing management, supplier management, and functional management
- Strong business acumen and commercial awareness
- A broad understanding of the role and impact of procurement within an organization
- Sound knowledge of company policies platforms and standards and legislation to ensure the creation of effective and binding contracts
- Strong change management capabilities to establish new ways of working
Company Profile: Since its founding in 1982, Chip Mong has focused extensively on the changing needs of the society and the strengthening of its relationships with business communities, both domestically and internationally. In recent years, Chip Mong has experienced tremendous growth and evolved into one of the largest groups of companies in the country, comprising seven wholly-owned subsidies, three joint-ventures, and two hotel projects. Chip Mong’s businesses include construction and materials, consumers goods, property development, beverages, general industrials, hospitality, retail and feed. The Company also offers a vast array of consumer products from well-known manufacturers throughout the region.

- At least 3 - 5 years of outdoor sales experience preferably from FMCG
- Able to collaborate across different levels of the organization and a proven ability to build and manage relationships internally and externally.
- Excellent communicator and good interpersonal skill, able to handle difficult business situations and negotiate well
- Good command of English, arithmetic skill required and computer literate
- Require the possession of a valid state driving license and be able to drive a vehicle with a willingness to work a flexible schedule with night market visits.
- Ability to supervise and guide assigned staff to achieve task objectives
- Ability to maintain performance expectations given limited resources
- An outgoing and friendly personality, honest and with integrity

Company Profile:
Wing Bank (Cambodia) Plc – the bank for every Cambodian – is driven by the vision to provide every Cambodian with convenient access to financial services relevant to, and for the improvement of their daily lives.

Wing Bank has revolutionized the way Cambodians access financial services by introducing instant, secure, and convenient Mobile Financial Services since 18 August 2008.

Today, Wing Bank serves the entire Cambodian population with 100% coverage of the districts in Cambodia thanks to the innovative Wing Bank App, over 10,000 Wing Cash Xpress agents, over 55,000 merchants, and partnerships with industry giants such as Mastercard, MoneyGram, AliPay, WeChat Pay, Western Union, Visa, and Ria.

Wing Bank provides an array of advanced financial products both for individual and corporate customers. These include loans, deposits, micro savings, credit referral services, money transfers, utility and insurance payments, supply chain payments, payroll services and even phone top-ups. In addition, Wing offers retail payments via “WingPay”, and has also introduced the “WingMall” e-commerce platform.

Both small and large companies alike are now using Wing’s payroll and disbursement services, speeding up their payments. Over 80% of Wing’s agents and 50% of customers are women, making Wing a shining example of gender inclusion in the region.

Wing Bank is committed to providing financial, gender and digital inclusion to the unbanked and the under-banked, allowing every Cambodian to enjoy convenience and security when it comes to financial services
Contact Info: Contact Information HR Department   078 988 290 / 078 989 509 / 078 989 114 jobs@wingbank.com.kh No. 721, Preah Monivong Blvd., Sangkat Beung Keng Kang 3, Khan Chamkar Mon, Phnom Penh, Cambodia 078 988 290 / 078 989 509 / 078 989 114

Job Description:
•  Perform all daily inspections to achieve the quality of construction required in the drawings and specifications for all works.
•  Develop method statement and inspection checklist based on approved design and specifications of the project and to organize them so that the Quality inspections are done in timely manner not to delay works progress. 
•  Assist Manager/Supervisor, QAQC & HSE to determine all standards to perform inspection and tests on all procedures and oversee all testing methods and maintain high standards of quality for all construction processes. 
•  Assist Manager/Supervisor, QAQC & HSE in raising NCR when construction standards / requirements are not met on site.
•  Take part in analysing nonconformities and proposing corrections, determining the causes of nonconformities, and corrective and preventive action.
•  Work with CMLD Site Team, Contractors or Subcontractors to identify quality issues and propose corrective actions to avoid repeat of same defects.
•  Prepare daily QA/QC report regarding inspections, materials, etc.
Other tasks assigned by Supervisor.
•  Manages all the project quality documents, especially those relating to situations of nonconformity situations.

•  Conduct daily safety and housekeeping inspections on site and issue safety violations report to Direct works or Contractors. Inspect and rectify any unsafe behaviors and unsafe situations at worksite.
•  Conduct accident/incident/near-misses investigation. Analyze the root cause and corrective & preventive action.
•  Assist in monitoring and implementing Project Safety Plan and procedures defined by Manager, QAQC & HSE and Project Management Team.

•  Carry out regular Toolbox meeting to reinforce safety awareness and measures towards direct workers or contractors.
•  Help to collect Safety statistics from Contractors for Monthly Reporting.
•  Review contractors’ method statement and/or safety plans on a safe working procedures point of view and check implementation on site.
•  Risk assessment of the site activities to ensure good working condition of Human, Equipment and Environment.
•  Priorities will be to focus on following main risks: Fall of person from height, Falling objects, Lifting Operations, Electricity on site, Excavations and Road Traffic Safety.

Company Profile:
Wing Bank (Cambodia) Plc – the bank for every Cambodian – is driven by the vision to provide every Cambodian with convenient access to financial services relevant to, and for the improvement of their daily lives.

Wing Bank has revolutionized the way Cambodians access financial services by introducing instant, secure, and convenient Mobile Financial Services since 18 August 2008.

Today, Wing Bank serves the entire Cambodian population with 100% coverage of the districts in Cambodia thanks to the innovative Wing Bank App, over 10,000 Wing Cash Xpress agents, over 55,000 merchants, and partnerships with industry giants such as Mastercard, MoneyGram, AliPay, WeChat Pay, Western Union, Visa, and Ria.

Wing Bank provides an array of advanced financial products both for individual and corporate customers. These include loans, deposits, micro savings, credit referral services, money transfers, utility and insurance payments, supply chain payments, payroll services and even phone top-ups. In addition, Wing offers retail payments via “WingPay”, and has also introduced the “WingMall” e-commerce platform.

Both small and large companies alike are now using Wing’s payroll and disbursement services, speeding up their payments. Over 80% of Wing’s agents and 50% of customers are women, making Wing a shining example of gender inclusion in the region.

Wing Bank is committed to providing financial, gender and digital inclusion to the unbanked and the under-banked, allowing every Cambodian to enjoy convenience and security when it comes to financial services
Contact Info: Contact Information HR Department   078 988 290 / 078 989 509 / 078 989 114 jobs@wingbank.com.kh No. 721, Preah Monivong Blvd., Sangkat Beung Keng Kang 3, Khan Chamkar Mon, Phnom Penh, Cambodia 078 988 290 / 078 989 509 / 078 989 114

Job Description:
- Manage the processing of incoming calls to the Help Desk via both telephone and e-mail to ensure courteous, timely, and effective resolution of end user issues.
-Design and enforce request handling and escalation policies and procedures.
- Coordinate and/or perform hands-on fixes at the desktop level, including installing and upgrading software, installing hardware, implementing file backups, and configuring systems and applications.
- Monitor and test fixes to ensure problems have been adequately resolved.
- Access software updates, drivers, knowledge bases, and frequently asked questions resources on the Internet to aid in problem resolution.
- Track and analyze trends in Help Desk requests and generate statistical reports.
- Assess need for any system reconfigurations (minor or significant) based on request trends and make recommendations.
- Identify, recommend, develop, and implement end user training programs to increase computer literacy and self-sufficiency.
- Oversee development and dissemination of help sheets, usage guides, and FAQ lists for end users.
- Oversee the development, implementation, and administration of help desk staff training procedures and policies.
- Improve efficiency and effectiveness of helpdesk activity
- Report to line manager on any issue that could significant impact the daily operation and business
- Identify opportunities for productivity and service delivery of improvements, cost reduce and additional revenues recovery
Job Requirement:
- Graduated bachelor degree of Information Technology, preferably in the field of Computer Science
- At least 3+ year of experiences leading in IT support
- At least 3+ year of experiences to manage user account (AD, Email Server, File Server, and Vmware)
- 3+ years’ experiences providing first and second level customer/technical support
- Demonstrated progressive experience in the supervision of a technical support team.
- Proven track record of developing and providing Service Level Agreements and Help Desk deliverables.
- Solid relationship management and performance management skills.
- Ability to motivate and direct staff members and subordinates.
- Strong understanding of the organization’s goals and objectives.
- Exceptional written and oral communication skills.
- Exceptional interpersonal skills, with a focus on listening and questioning skills.
- Strong documentation skills.
- Ability to conduct research into a wide range of computing issues as required.
- Ability to absorb and retain information quickly.
- Ability to present ideas in user-friendly language to non-technical staff and end users.
- Proven analytical and problem-solving abilities.
- Ability to effectively prioritize and execute tasks in a high-pressure environment.
- Exceptional customer service orientation.
- Experience working in a team-oriented, collaborative environment.
- Experiences understating of networks/networking (servers, router, switches, firewall, Wifi, TCP/IP, and DNS)
- Having high level of confidentiality, integrity and business ethic
- Ability to work under pressure and tight deadlines
- Be detail oriented
- Be able to carry out multiple assignments
- Have effective coaching and mentoring guideline

Job Description:

_ and 1 year as credit officer

_ Good verbal and written communication in both Khmer and English

_ Good computer literacy

_ High commitment and able to work under pressure.
Company Profile:
Amret (https://www.amret.com.kh) is a leading microfinance institution established in 1991 that contributes to the economic and social development of Cambodia by providing a wide range of financial services to meet the needs of the large targeted customers. Amret has strong commitment and long-term business strategies to be a leading financial institution in the market by deploying ambitious digital strategies. 

Amret belongs to the Advans international group (www.advansgroup.com) a major shareholder and international shareholder (FMO and IFC). The Advans group serves over 750,000 clients, and has expanded its operations in nine countries such as Cambodia, Cameroon, Ivory Coast, Democratic Republic of Congo, Ghana, Myanmar, Nigeria, Pakistan, and Tunisia. 

Amret has more than 150 branches, located in 25 cities and provinces in Cambodia, and successfully serves 450,000 customers with around 4,000 highly dedicated employees.
Contact Info: Contact Information Recruitment and Job Management  092333020 jobs@amret.com.kh #80, Street 315, Sangkat Boeung Kak2, Khan Toul Kok, Phnom Penh, Cambodia. 092333020

Company Profile:
RMA entered the Cambodian market in 1992 as an exclusive provider of dedicated system solutions for commercial and non-commercial enterprises in the sectors of infrastructure, energy and logistics. Gradually, the company has been growing alongside the development of Cambodia and expanded to automotive, agricultural and heavy equipment, warehouse solutions, financial services, car rental and food franchise management.  In addition to business expansion, RMA Cambodia has also focused its attention on human resources by providing internships and employment opportunities to approximately 2,000 local and professional staff with a number of expatriates working together to share their skills and expertise.

RMA Cambodia has also been very active within local communities. We consistently work with local authorities and organizations to provide financial and technical assistance in essential key sectors, such as health, environment, education and sports.

We aim to help Cambodia grow and prosper.

OUR SERVICES AND PRODUCTS:

RMA Cambodia and its affiliate Asia Vehicle Rental (AVR) are offering franchised car rental services through the global brand AVIS. Rentals are customized with brand-new Ford vehicles and experienced English-speaking chauffeurs. AVIS also offers car rental and leasing that meets all types of customers requirements for business trips, leisure or field work, with or without chauffeurs.

RMA Cambodia has a financing arm, RMA Financial Services, offers financing solutions to flexibly meet the needs of corporate and retail customers for the purchase of their own automotive and heavy equipment, agricultural machinery and warehouse solution equipment.

RMA Cambodia is also a provider of heavy equipment products and solutions in construction, road building and maintenance, and agriculture, namely JCB, Mitsubishi FUSO and John Deere. RMA Cambodia is an agent for the world’s leading brands in these industries.

Job Description: This role is responsible for the charge of assessing Track, Monitor and Review all the Sales related Contracts and Claims, and report monthly, supporting and ensuring all the Contract Sponsorship, Incentives, and all kind of Sales related incentives are operating in an Effective and Efficient manner.** Main Duties• To carry out the assessment and analysis for all contract proposals propose by the Sales Teams, provide the comments to highlight the risks and opportunities to align with the approved SOP.• To assist Sales Admin Manager in drafting and setting the Standard Operation Procedure (SOP) for all the Sales Related Contracts, Sponsorship and Claims processes, review, and feedback with the SOP Adherence from time to time basis.• To support the Sales planning & forecasting by providing the Data and Reports to assist on the Sales Planning processes.• To track and update with the progress of sales commitments/targets and orders status to Sales Teams and customers.• To review all the Sales Related contracts and provides the Monthly and Quarterly Reviews to the Sales Teams and management. • To check and review all the Sales related sponsorships and claims, prepare a Payment Proposal according to the level of approval to aligned with the Chart of Authority (COA) standard.• To collaborate with Finance, Credit Control, and Sales Region on Customer’s credit status (Statement) before every sponsorship or Claims payout.• Compiling all the necessary documents, claims, and reports from all the Regions.• To ensure a Proper Filling System to keep all the Sales Related Contracts, SOPs, Claims, and all the supporting documents.   • People Development   o Learn to Improve Behavior  o Identify and propose training for self and team members for improvements.

Job Description:
• To carry out the Sales Development program to improve on the company’s 4 Key Enablers (Sales Tools, Winning Team, Perfect Serve, Excellent Outlet Execution) and 5 Winning’s Behaviors (Learn to Improve, Keep It Simple, Life-Saving Rules, Collaborate Through Trust, Speed & Action) in the assigned Region.

o Learn to Improve and Self Development Behaviors

• Integrity, Self-Discipline, Trustworthy and reliable.
• Excellent communication skills (interpersonal/presentation/Computer)
• Coaching and mentoring skills.
• Good at interpersonal skills.
• Solid analytical, Planning, and Organizing skills.
• Excellent business acumen and a good understanding of the market with entrepreneurial zest.
• Self-starter mindset, Self-Confident, good work Ethic, Assertive and Problem-solving skills.
• Effective, Positive and Energetic Attitude.
• Ability to communicate clearly - Decent presentation skills.
• Strong Leadership skills, Team-orientation, and ability to coach the team.
• Action-oriented, persistent, and result-oriented.

Core Responsibilities•	To identify the opportunity in strategic way for Outlet display, Flagship acquisition, Brand Promoter and Cooler Deployment in the designated Key Customers.•	To identify the business opportunity and create the partnership with the customers in conjunction with Customer’s promotion calendar and Festive Promotion (custom make promotion with group)•	Build long-term working relationships with key Customers.•	Monitor customers’ performance (distribution, shipments, pricing, promotional materials)•	Ensure that agreed upon sales volume and profit goals are achieved while aggressively controlling costs by Customer Accounts.•	Managing the Sponsorship, Outlet Incentives, Credit Terms and prioritize efforts consistent with Hanuman’s goals.•	Grow and gain Market Share in Mainstream Plus and Premium categories with customers.•	CONTRACT Management - (contracts/tracking/business review/dissolution) o	Making business proposal for the assigned Customers.o	Manage sales and distribution targets, setting objective within the assigned customers.•	CHANNEL Managemento	Execution and Implementation of Promotion/Activities with alignment to brand/channel strategies.o	To negotiate and implement the PICOS & EOE standard with assigned Customers.o	Upholding disciplined and relevant processes for assigned customer’s business development planning (including trading terms agreements), Customer Business Review and In-store execution in assigned Customers.o	Market Intelligent responsibility, information gathering, competitor’s activities, Trends analysis and Competitor’s pricing update.•	CUSTOMER RELATIONS Managemento	New Customer penetration (Identify, approach and acquisition) and building long-term working relationships with assigned areas.o	Regular dialogue with assigned customers to review business performance and customer service level to enhance customer satisfaction.o	Maintain customer database and supports Regional Sales Team’s strategy and process ensuring these customers are served appropriately to maintain credible relationships based on trust and sense of being a real business partner.•	Ensure excellence in-market executiono	Driving promotions and merchandising with complies to PICOS & EOE standard.o	Promotion (NCP) execution excellence.o	To ensure the healthy Stock level with each customer.•	Market Intelligento	Competitors Activities Feedback and Reports•	People Development o	Lean to Improve Behavior.o	Supervising and coaching the Sales Representatives in the assigned outlets.•	S&OP Forecast Accuracyo	To ensure Forecast Accuracy input by Brand and by SKU for the assigned Customers.
Job Requirement: 2.	Professional Qualification and Competencies•	Preferably a minimum of 4 years in a FMCG environment with at least 2 years’ experience in On-Trade or F&B industry.•	Experienced and knowledge with Drinks industry / Hotel F&B background highly preferred.•	Integrity, Self-Discipline, Trustworthy and reliable.•	Strategic thinking, organizing, planning, control, and execution skills•	Analytical and numerical skills•	Assertive, self-confident, and matured with good problem-solving skills•	Good, presentation and computer skills•	High communication skills, interpersonal and networking skills •	Strong business acumen with entrepreneurial zest •	Good in English

Job Description:
Strategic Purpose
• To assist Region on Identification, Planning, Coordination of National and Regional tactical promotions; Tracks & Reviews the achievement according to the target and objectives to aligned with PICOS & EOE standard.

• Responsible for the Regional Sales Forecast in alignment with S&OP Processes.

(Visibility, Amenities, Tactical Promotion, BP & Sampling)

• Integrity, Self-Discipline, Trustworthy and reliability.
• Strategic thinking, organizing, planning, control, and execution skills
• Strong in Analytical and numerical skills
• Assertive, self-confident, and matured with good problem-solving skills
• Good, presentation and computer skills
• High communication skills, interpersonal and networking skills 
• Strong business acumen with entrepreneurial zest

Job Description:
Position Summary: 
S/he will help to support and coordinate for tax work, prepare document for import goods by form D and update report to Accounting Manager and GM if required.

• Prepare monthly tax for tax department, ensures that it complies with Cambodia taxation laws and regulations
• Reconciles all taxes, ensures correct payments and complies with Cambodian taxation laws
• Deals with tax officer for both interim and comprehensive audit from tax department during tax audit
• Organize and maintain all tax related paperwork for future audit.
• Reconcile VAT Input and VAT Output at the end of every month.
• Assess and research difficult tax issues to identify solutions. 
• Negotiate with tax authorities over tax payment issues.
• Update all new regulations from tax department to management.
Other tasks assign by manager.
• Reconciles all taxes to complies with Cambodia Taxation laws and regulations
• Able to make decisions related to routine work or each assignment
• Propose changes to the schedule of tasks
• Make suggestions or recommendations to improve task outcomes
Job Requirement:
Requirements:
• Bachelor’s degree in Accounting or a related field
• 3 years of related work. 
• At least 2 year of experience in the beverage or FMCG industry
• Understanding of accounting and tax process and regulations
• Knowledge of tasks management
• Accounting and tax
• Intermediate proficiency in MS Office, Peachtree system
• Excellent presentation, interpersonal and communication skills
• Good organizational skills
• Ability to think creatively and innovatively
• Ability to work with people across different function & cultures

job title: Sales Unit Manager, Senior Sales Officer
position: Sales Unit Manager, Senior Sales Officer
Job Description:
I. Sales Unit Manager: 
- Build and grow insurance salesforces including corporate, partner and recruiting teams and increase sales volume.
- Lead and manage sales channel & distribution under full-time and part-time seller team to achieve its sales targets, objectives and planned activities.
- Engage, collaborate and build relationship with internal and external salesforces to achieve objectives.
- Develop and manage campaigns to support and promote the sales in agency channel.
- Implement established sales plans and customer strategies.
- Ensure agency sales support functions are in place.
- Maintain industry knowledge of prospect customer and needs for our products and services.
- Work closely with Sale and Operational team and other relevant teams.
- Perform other tasks assigned by management

II. Senior Sales Officer: 
- Finding the prospective client to achieve the sales targets and objective. 
- Visit to customer and partner to build the 
- Plan and manage partnership with business entities to achieve sales targets, objectives and planned activities.
- Implement established sales plans and customer service strategies.
- Develop and manage campaigns to obtain sale result.
- Prepare report of sales activities and sale results
- Perform other tasks assigned by management.
Job Requirement:
I. Sales Unit Manager: 
- Minimum Bachelor Degree in Business, Sale, Marketing, Management or equivalent.
- Minimum 3 years sales team management experience.
- Minimum 3 years target sales experience.
- Experience in financial sector is an advantage.
- Understanding of insurance concept is an advantage.
- Demonstrated ability to manage complex deals.
- Demonstrated ability to manage sale force on tight deadline and target.
- Visionary and possess strong leadership skills.
- Strong in strategic thinking, problem-solving and negotiation skills.
- Excellent interpersonal and communication skills.
- Proficient in verbal and written English and Khmer.

II. Senior Sales Officer: 
- Minimum Bachelor Degree in Business, Sale, Marketing or equivalent.
- 2 year experiences as sales in insurance sector is more advantage.
- Experience from financial sector is an advantage.
- Demonstrated experience in establishing and managing relationship with business entities and individual customers.
- Visionary and possess strong leadership skills.
- Good in strategic thinking, problem-solving and negotiation skills.
- Good interpersonal and communication skills.
- Proficient in verbal and written English and Khmer

(Strong verbal and written communication skills) Chinese is a plus.● Fearlessness – This is a unique project and we need someone not afraid to fail a  few times before we get things right; we are looking at candidates who are not afraid  to propose bold ideas, but humble enough to learn from them when they fail. Company Profile: Urban Hub Cambodia is a multi-award-winner and one of Cambodia’s biggest fully licensed real estate developers. We are committed to developing projects that provide the new generations of Cambodia with exceptional modern living and experience of the first world that focuses on “LIVE, WORK, PLAY” yet preserving the Cambodian tradition and identity of community living.Registered in 2017, Urban Hub Cambodia is a joint venture between a Hong Kong-based conglomerate, Goldfame Group, the largest Hong Kong investor in Cambodia since 1992, and a Cambodian-American real estate company, Urban Living Solutions. Urban Hub Cambodia has quickly become a leading mixed-use property developer and the first developer ever from Cambodia to win the most awards including two major regional awards, “Best Condo Development in Asia 2019” and “Best Co-working Space in Asia 2020” at Asia’s longest-running and most respected property awards organized by PropertyGuru. Urban Hub Cambodia is behind the four most award-winning Cambodian projects both locally and regionally, including Urban Loft, Factory Phnom Penh, Urban Village Phase 1, and Urban Village Phase 2. More projects are expected in the near future.

Job Description:
1. Responsibility: Control quality of products from suppliers, production process, production
activities, packaging, delivery process
2. Job Duty:
- Control quality of inputs from suppliers
- Control production process from quality points of view and promptly analyze the root causes
- Define controlled and verification quality items of finished goods
- Inspect and test the quality of products after defined items
- Control quality of packaging and delivery status- Assure product qualities with customers
- Confirm customers work if there is any impacts to our products
- Prepare quality documents to get approval from customers
- Respond to customers' requests, including customer's audit
- Hold quality meeting to get delivery approval
- Analysis quality of part/product about in-line defect, customer claim.
Job Requirement:
- Age: 20 ~ 30
- Sex: Male
- Bachelor degree in Engineering in field mechanics, electronic, electricity or automotive, or
relevant field.
- Primary mathematics ability
- Basic PC skill (Excel, word, Power Point)
- English communication
- Open mind & team work mind
- Good problem analysis skill (QC tools is must, statistic method is wanted)
- Understand basic measurement method (Vernier and micro-meter is must. Precise
measurement; e.g. Coordinate and shape measuring are wanted)

Job Description:
Personal Trainer assess their customers physical and sometimes mental strengths and weaknesses, to in best practice be able to create customized workout plans.
Personal Trainer provides physical and mental guidance and monitor customers' progress on a regular basis. Personal 
Trainer can work with individuals or in small groups.
** Responsibilities of a Personal Trainer:
- Evaluate clients' fitness levels and health conditions
- Build individualized exercises and nutrition programs
- Monitor progress of clients' fitness levels 
- Explain safe and proper use of gym equipment
- Lead both individual and group training sessions
- Research on new exercise techniques and trends
- Promote the gym's  fitness packages and plans
- Be able to perform CPR and administer first aid in case of emergencies
Job Requirement:
- Knowledge of various fitness programs from basic exercises to more challenging training sessions
- Ability to guide and motivate clients
- Time management skills
- Basic knowledge of various exercise machines and equipment.
- Available to work flexible hours
- Good communication skills
- Trained in CPR and first aid

Job Description:

Company Profile:
RMA entered the Cambodian market in 1992 as an exclusive provider of dedicated system solutions for commercial and non-commercial enterprises in the sectors of infrastructure, energy and logistics. Gradually, the company has been growing alongside the development of Cambodia and expanded to automotive, agricultural and heavy equipment, warehouse solutions, financial services, car rental and food franchise management.  In addition to business expansion, RMA Cambodia has also focused its attention on human resources by providing internships and employment opportunities to approximately 2,000 local and professional staff with a number of expatriates working together to share their skills and expertise.

RMA Cambodia has also been very active within local communities. We consistently work with local authorities and organizations to provide financial and technical assistance in essential key sectors, such as health, environment, education and sports.

We aim to help Cambodia grow and prosper.

OUR SERVICES AND PRODUCTS:

RMA Cambodia and its affiliate Asia Vehicle Rental (AVR) are offering franchised car rental services through the global brand AVIS. Rentals are customized with brand-new Ford vehicles and experienced English-speaking chauffeurs. AVIS also offers car rental and leasing that meets all types of customers requirements for business trips, leisure or field work, with or without chauffeurs.

RMA Cambodia has a financing arm, RMA Financial Services, offers financing solutions to flexibly meet the needs of corporate and retail customers for the purchase of their own automotive and heavy equipment, agricultural machinery and warehouse solution equipment.

RMA Cambodia is also a provider of heavy equipment products and solutions in construction, road building and maintenance, and agriculture, namely JCB, Mitsubishi FUSO and John Deere. RMA Cambodia is an agent for the world’s leading brands in these industries.
Contact Info: Contact Information RMA CAMBODIA  017888390 recruitment.kh@rmagroup.net #27, St. 134, SangkatMittapheap, Khan 7 Makara, Phnom Penh 017888390

job title: Head of Section, Fuel Ash Handling
position: Head of Section, Fuel Ash Handling
Job Description:
JOB SUMMARY
We have a Head of Section, Fuel Ash Handling position to be based in Sihanoukville, Cambodia. The role is performing to complete special tasks as assigned by Department Head or
Management, to motivate subordinates through friendly relation and building teamwork and to support other departments in case of need.

Key responsibilities:
• Responsible for all functions of Coal, Fuel Oil, Ash for a safe, reliable, consistent
operations. Ensure no business loss due to any wrong operation of FAH.

• Ensure availability and healthiness of Jetty unloading system includes the cranes, conveyor belts and other auxiliary equipment related to unloading system. The minimum unloading rate is 8,000 tons per day.
• Ensure right quality coal (size and moisture) feed into bunker by time-to-time supervision and ensuring through team.
• Ensure coal stock level is always within the PPA requirement, minimum of 30 days generation.
• Always ensure the coal bunker stock levels are maintained between normal to full level without any generation loss. Responsible for availability and healthiness of Coal feeding
system more than 95%.
• Responsible for the overseeing of the job allocation for the conveyor belt operators, coal unloading crane drivers, and coal unloading drivers effectively.
• Responsible to keep track on the arrival of the coal barges with follow up from the supplier and prepare a plan for unloading schedule.
• Responsible to liaise with maintenance department to carry out any maintenance in coal handling section; accordingly, he needs to make available the other equipment to operate
without affecting the operation.
• Responsible to execute and implement capex budget effectively within the budget and time frame.
• Responsible to Approve FAH staff attendance, leave, overtime, shift schedule and solve other HR issues.
• Responsible for implementation of environment compliance related to coal, ash and fuel oil.
• To ensure and maintain low levels of ash silos, need to coordinate with ash off taker for emptying the ash from silos.
• Follow work procedure and contribute to safety improvement in workplace by considering risk factors in Operation activities.
• Follow all HSE rules and housekeeping standards, communicate HSE rules and expectations to the workforce and investigate HSE incidents as appropriate.
• To generate reports in Microsoft office (word / excel / power point) and submit to Operation Manger as and when required or advised.
Job Requirement:
- Degree qualification, preferably Mechanical/ Power Plant Engineering/Electrical discipline.
- Minimum 10-year experience in handling coal handling plant or material handling plant having crushers, unloading cranes, conveyor belts, heavy equipment’s etc.
- Unloading system through ships and barges is desirable.
- Work as a head of section role for minimum 3 years with managing human resources of more than 50 manpower.
- Good hand in Computer and general software skills.
- Conversant in handling CMMS, HRIS and advance software.
- Alert round the clock to attend any operation issues of FAH.
- Attend urgent call from the plant, when there is a need of emergency.
- Solve the Operation issues and guide the supervisor remotely for uninterrupted operation of FAH.
- Good vision, judgement and focus oriented.
- Calm and soft behavior personality.
- Having good tolerance and convincing capabilities.

Interested applicants are required to send in their applications together with the resume/CV with recent
photograph, current salary and expected salary to the following address: -
Recruitment, Human Resources Department
Cambodian Energy Limited 
Phum 2, Kampenh Commune, Steung Hav District, Preah Sihanouk Province, Kingdom of Cambodia
Tel: (+855) 16 900 906 / 93 918 009
Or
Email to: hr.cambodia@leaderenergy.net
Company Profile:
Cambodian Energy Limited is apart of the Power Division under the LEADER ENERGY Group with headquarters in Penang, Malaysia. LEADER ENERGY Group is a member of HNG Capital (www.hngcapital.com). We currently own power assets (generation and transmission) in Cambodia, Vietnam, and Malaysia. LEADER ENERGY also expanded into the new market swiftly in Taiwan, undertaking various solar projects including the floating solar, ground solar and rooftop solar that are expanding steadily and rapidly across Taiwan. In support of the use of renewable energy, it is now offering the rooftop solar photovoltaic system to benefit Commercial & Industrial partners in Thailand, Indonesia and Singapore who share the same value for environmental sustainability.

LEADER ENERGY Group is committed to an expansion programme, which visualises an increased ownership of power assets in the ASEAN region.

For more information, please visit our website at www.leaderenergy.com
Contact Info: Contact Information HR Department  016 900 906 / 093 918 009 hr.cambodia@leaderenergy.com Phum 2, Kampenh Commune, Steung Hav District, Preah Sihanouk Province,Kingdom of Cambodia 016 900 906 / 093 918 009

Company Profile:
Starting from 1951 in Texas, United States, Circle K is now one of  the most widely recognized convenience store brands, known worldwide for  quality products & great customer service with more than 15.000  associates worldwide including Hong Kong, China, Vietnam, Indonesia,  UAE, Macau, Mexico, Honduras, Guam, Malaysia, The Philippines, Egypt  & Costa Rica…

At Circle K Cambodia, our mission is to be the best and most convenient place for all of your daily shopping needs.

Vision
To be the leading No 1 Neighborhood Convenience Store in Cambodia providing 24 hours conveniences, exclusive merchandise and value added services to our customers.

Mission
To Make Our Customer Life’s a Little Easier Everyday

Core Value
1- Customer Focus: Customer are the reason for our success in Business and we are committed to listen and respond positively to their need.
2- Integrity: Honest, Trustworthy, Adhere to Strong Moral and Ethical Principle and Value.
3- Teamwork: one team, one goal and one direction – with collaboration, share and support each other.
4- Accountability: taking ownership for a task or role and committed to execute and deliver result.
5- Courtesy & Respect: treating other people the way you want to be treated.
6- Continuous Growth: Proactive to Adapt to Instance change.
7- Excellent: Aim for higher quality and accuracy, usually above performance standard.

Currently Circle K Cambodia is having more than 35 Store locate in the following:
- Phnnom Penh
- Siem Reap

Job Description:
JOB RESPONSE & DUTY
1.	Daily Costing Operation Supporting
•	Daily posting stock issue for warehouse from project to project
•	Daily operation supporting with document attached and follow up
•	Update posting job journal , transfer order both manual and system
•	Cost Pricing / Invoicing of Inventory to related parties
•	Inventory Costing, including Construction Materials and Tool.
•	Comply with Generally Accepted Accounting Principles (GAAP) for financial statements
•	Supporting developing and maintain the cost accounting system, documents, and records of the organization
2.	Closed Weekly and Monthly Cost Report
•	Posting cost report in system timely basic
•	Spot check document attached and record to make sure it corrected
•	Supporting closed cost allocate and updated job both system and manual .
•	Support in Monthly physical stock count, input and reconcile with warehouse.
•	Assist cost supervisor to ensure monthly cost of goods sold by project accurate .
•	Assist cost supervisor for closed cost allocation by project and reconcile job posting.
•	Supporting supervisor/manager to ensure costing report are closed by timely and reconciliation .
3.	Other Cost Report Supporting
•	Support management for other reporting 
•	Regularly follow up with all project to obtain any revised BOM & BOQ before project started.
•	Other tasks assigned by Cost Account Manager
4.	Costing System Knowledge
•	Must able knowledge costing system and other related .
•	Understanding costing procedure and SOP
5.	Coordinate auditing and BOQ-BOM spot check
•	Supporting audit work for spot check site with warehouse issued
•	Assist Cost supervisor for site spot check with BOQ & BOM concern with site and material issued from warehouse by project.
•	Record concern and report to management
•	Supporting BOM & BOQ control 
•	Prepare and complete document internal cost audits
Job Requirement:
JOB REQUIREMENT

1.	កំរិតនៃការអប់រំ /Education Qualification
•	University Degree (Accounting Field)

2.	បទពិសោធន៍ការងារនិងចំណេះដឹង /Work Experience & Knowledge
•	At least 1 years of work experience in QS/QC ,Accounting /Cost control or related field
•	Experience in retail, wholesale, warehousing, or logistics, construction field
•	Good in English Language
•	SAP , ERP System

3.	ជំនាញបច្ចេកទេស /Technical Skills

•	Strong Proficient with computers and other standard office technology 
•	Knowledge how to reconcile report
•	Audit skill and problems solve 
•	Advance knowledge of Microsoft office, MS Excel and reporting tools

4.	ជំនាញទន់ /Soft Skills

•	Good in communication and interpersonal skills
•	Effective team and relationship building
•	Good knowledge in consultation, coaching and advisory
•	Work under pressure and flexible 
•	Strong commitment

Job Description: Senior Tax Officer / Tax OfficerA Tax Officer / Senior Tax Officer under the accounting department is responsible for working on tax activities including tax planning, tax compliance, and preparation of corporate and personal tax returns.The role of Tax Officer involves both advisory and compliance aspects. Tax Officer must understand tax legislation, compliance with relevant laws, and the impact this has on a business.  Main responsibilities:•	Prepare tax declaration forms such as VAT, PPT, WHT, and Profit Tax.•	Meeting deadlines for tax declarations (monthly tax, annual tax, etc.)•	Understand, analyze, and process financial accounting data so that legal documents can be properly presented to the General Department of Taxation.•	Create a tax strategy and procedures to help the company maintain or improve its benefits.•	Work with General Department of Taxation to submit all documents for tax declaration•	Make tax payments at banks.•	Prepare/copy all documents for tax audit•	Perform other tasks as assigned by Manager
Job Requirement: Job requirements: •	Bachelor's degree in Finance or Accounting or equivalent•	Proven years of experience in taxation•	Good communication and interpersonal skills•	Hard-working, fast learning, and highly responsible for work•	Ability to use MS Office, accounting software, Internet, and Email•	Ability to work under pressure𝐎𝐭𝐡𝐞𝐫 𝐁𝐞𝐧𝐞𝐟𝐢𝐭:•	Yearly bonus•	Annual Leave, Sick Leave, Special Leave, and Public Holidays•	Shopping vouchers as incentives and more.Interested candidates are invited to submit their updated CV, cover letter & portfolio to our email: hr@zandokh.com or 𝙏𝙀𝙇𝙀𝙂𝙍𝘼𝙈: 𝟎𝟗𝟔 𝟗𝟏𝟓 𝟕𝟓𝟖𝟒For more insight into job details, please kindly contact 𝟎𝟗𝟔 𝟗𝟏𝟓 𝟕𝟓𝟖𝟒, 𝟎𝟏𝟐 𝟔𝟖𝟐 𝟎𝟑𝟔

Job Description:
Summary of Position
To support the CMI’s business units and project/plant operations with regards to the reinforcement of the company’s health, safety, and environment (HSE) policy and directives.

What you will do:
•	Establish and maintain relevant HSE records and documentation
•	Ensures the required PPE’s are available for staff and involve in PPE inventory management
•	Involves in risk assessment and hazard identification at workplaces and recommend the applicable control measures
•	Involves in the development of toolbox talks (TBT) and takes part in TBT meeting at plants/sites
•	Conducts the HSE inspections on plants/sites and CMI’s vehicles to ensure non-compliance issues are corrected
•	Develop and facilitate HSE training and induction to staff
•	Takes lead in screening tests (driving, drug, alcohol, COVID…)
•	Involves in accident/incident investigations and define the root causes for analysis and prevention, and ensure the reports are documented
•	Perform other duties as assigned
Job Requirement:
What you should have:
•	Bachelor’s degree in Business Administration, Civil Engineering, or a related field
•	At least 2 years of experience in the field of HSE management and/or construction site management or in related area
•	Knowledge of occupational health, safety, and environment
•	Knowledge of risk assessment and analysis
•	Knowledge in incident/accident investigation is much preferable
•	Computer proficiency in MS Office (Word, Excel, PowerPoint, E-mail)
•	Strong presentation, written communications, and report-writing skills in English and Khmer
•	Strong interpersonal skills
•	Ability to work under pressures
•	Ability to travel and work at designated provinces, if required
•	Valid driver’s license

What we offer:
We offer attractive remuneration and fringe benefits including free meals, Seniority payment, bonus, and insurance, etc. with excellent career development opportunities to the right candidates.

Note: Only shortlisted candidates will be contacted.
Company Profile: Since its founding in 1982, Chip Mong has focused extensively on the changing needs of the society and the strengthening of its relationships with business communities, both domestically and internationally. In recent years, Chip Mong has experienced tremendous growth and evolved into one of the largest groups of companies in the country, comprising seven wholly-owned subsidies, three joint-ventures, and two hotel projects. Chip Mong’s businesses include construction and materials, consumers goods, property development, beverages, general industrials, hospitality, retail and feed. The Company also offers a vast array of consumer products from well-known manufacturers throughout the region.

Job Description:
- Create & seamless customer service" by making every effort to find merchandise for customers even if an item is not in stock .
- Be personally available to all customers to communicate and identify their needs and address their questions or concerns.
- Develop your own & core & customer service. Budgeting and Planning
- In conjunction with the General Manager, formulate the fiscal revenue, expense and profit goals for the store.
- Ensure that goals will be met through appropriate planning and organization of staff, inventory, and expenses for short and long term success.
- Develop and monitor the capital expense budget to ensure that the store is properly maintained and upgraded to meet the high maintenance standards that reflect the
image.
- Maintain expenses measured as a percentage of sales.
- Meet or exceed the budgeted margin contribution.
- Make staff aware of sales goals.
- Monitor a loss prevention program to protect the company & inventory and assets.
- Take necessary action to lower expenses if sales goals are not being met. 

* Personnel

- Hire people who are passionate about our products and philosophy.
- Inspire employees so that each person contributes to the productivity of the store.
- Maintain staff levels that allow for the best possible customer service.
- Delegate work load appropriately and effectively.
- Write performance evaluations and goal assessments on the Sales Supervisor.
- With the Sales Supervisor, evaluate all store employees; Ensure that reviews are given on schedule and documentation is received by the Human Resources Department according to the guidelines outlined by the H.R.

- When necessary, discipline employees consistent with the company disciplinary policies.
- Communicate with the General Manager on daily basis via the phone or by written report so that your store and employees are recognized for what it is doing in customer
service, events, and local issues.
- Review on a monthly basis, the store's progress with the General Manager.
- Hold weekly staff meetings and submit notes to General Manager.
- Maintain open and positive relations with all divisions of the company .
- Work with procurement and logistics to establish the inventory levels for your store.
- Ensure that company policy and procedures are communicated in a timely manner and adhered to accordingly.

* Leadership, Training and Staff Development

- Develop and support a positive attitude toward .
- Maintain employee attitude and morale by recognizing outstanding performance and service.
- Motivate and develop staff in order to encourage their professional development.
- Maintain training standards to ensure both product and systems expertise that will improve store operations and allow for better customer service.
- Provide an & open door & policy where employees are free to express their concerns and feelings without fear of retribution or ill will.
- Develop a pool of potential Shop Managers/Supervisors to meet the long-range Retail and Company objectives.

* Merchandising/Marketing

- Maintain high merchandising values that reflect the image by being creative,
educational, inviting and expressive.
- Work in conjunction with the marketing department to develop an advertising or
promotional plan that will maximize retail sales for your store.
- Assist the Store Merchandiser in developing a merchandising plan each season that
enhances product presentation, and makes the store an easy place to shop.
- Ensure that the store is in compliance with all Airport, State and Federal employment laws, including wage and hour, human rights and equal employment opportunities.
- Maintain safe working conditions for employees and customers; Resolve safety concerns quickly.
- Ensure store security from internal and external theft and know the proper apprehension and prosecution procedures for your State.
Other duties as assigned.
Job Requirement:
- Bachelor’s degree in Management field or equivalent in work experience.
- At least 3 to 5 years of progressively responsible in retail sales experience.
- Product knowledge desired.
- Ability to give clear directions and set expectations for staff.
- Excellent organization and communication skills.
- Self-motivated.
- Ability to problem solve
- Ability to work with team.

Job Description:
** ABOUT YOUR ROLE :				
The Compliance Coordinator will coordinate with cross-functional teams to implement and improve Compliance Requirements.  The incumbent reviews, analyzes, and reports on compliance system and process discrepancies and develops/implements best practices for standardization and excellence.  				

** YOUR RESPONSIBILITIES WILL INCLUDE 				
- Taking care of Quality/EHS system deployment and audits (internal, external)
        + Social Compliance: ILO - International Labor Organization, SMETA
        + Quality Compliance: ISO 9001, TQP, Traceability
        + EHS Compliance:
- Manage safety, health and environement risks at work place; in charge for EHS legal compliance and customer requirement included but not limit: fire protection, PPE, machine safety, chemical management, waste management, environment protection, EHS training...
- Organize internal audit/checking and complete documentation related to EHS to meet requirement of local authority and customers
        + Sustainibility Compliance: FSC - Forest Stewardship Council, GRS - Global Recycle standard
        + Customers Compliances
- Conduct supplier quality & compliance audit and follow up finding/CAP closing
- Monitor daily compliances including annual internal audits, GEMBA
- Involve and follow up with cross-functional teams to close finding/CAP on time
- Drive the implementation of new requirements from Global and customers by providing trainings (Compliance, Quality, EHS) to cross-functional teams and suppliers"
Job Requirement:
** WHAT WE WILL BE LOOKING FOR IN YOU				
- Bachelor degree, preferably in Compliance, EHS, Quality or Industrial Management
- Certified Compliance, Auditor or other related certifications and affiliations preferred.
- 5+ years manufacturing and engineering or related experience  in Garment, Textile, Printing Industry, with supervisory or lead experience preferred.
- Sound engineering and people-leading skills.
- Demonstrated understanding and skills in project and program management, including 3rd parties.
- Lean manufacturing, Six Sigma, ISO or related experience preferred.
- Understanding of applicable computer systems, such as Microsoft Office and function specific software.
- Strong math and analytical skills.  
- Strong organization and attention to detail.  
- Strong scientific and engineering knowledge.
- Strong written and oral communication skills with ability to be an advisor to clients and build strong and sustainable relationships.
- Skilled in team building and experience in effectively working with cross functional teams.
Company Profile: Avery Dennison (NYSE: AVY) is a global materials science company specializing in the design and manufacture of a wide variety of labeling and functional materials.The company’s products, which are used in nearly every major industry, include pressure-sensitive materials for labels and graphic applications; tapes and other bonding solutions for industrial, medical, and retail applications; tags, labels and embellishments for apparel; and radio frequency identification (RFID) solutions serving retail apparel and other markets. Headquartered in Glendale, California, the company employs more than 30,000 employees in over 50 countries. Reported sales in 2019 were $7.1 billion
Contact Info: Contact Information Mr. Lay Meng  078 91 97 98  meng.lay@ap.averydennison.com #P1-21. P1-22, Phnom Penh Special Economic Zone (PPSEZ), National Road No4, Khan Posenchey,  Phnom Penh, Cambodia 078 91 97 98

job title: Spare Parts Officer (Phnom Penh & Siem Reap)
position: Spare Parts Officer (Phnom Penh & Siem Reap)
Job Description: - To control of Dealer Parts Operation and ensure storage technique- To ensure accuracy of Electronic Parts Catalogue usage to find right parts number and offer to Service Advisor to maximize Toyota Genuine Parts Sale- To place an order to Central Parts Depo for daily parts stock replenishment base on stock guideline- To perform stock transfer, receiving, binning, supplying parts to workshop and ensure proper monthly stock count in warehouse- To promote Fix-It-Right activity through right parts supply- To monitor stock in proper inventory level, aging stock, and conduct monthly stock counting- To cooperate with Service Advisors, conduct product proposal to boost parts, labor sales and role as Service Advisor as required- To keep warehouse in a good order, clean and maintain parts stock without lost- To daily follow-up of back order with Central Parts Depo and Service Advisor- To prepare daily report of Repair Order Fill Rate- Perform other tasks assigned by supervisor
Job Requirement: - Vocational training institution/ undergraduate or equivalent- Good knowledge of communication and convincing skills- Speedy and accuracy jobs requirement- Good teamwork and interpersonal skills- Good initiative and continuous improvement mindset- Good time management and result-oriented toward the job- Good at English language (speaking, writing, and listening skills)- Understanding of computer skills (MS Word, Excel, and Power Point)

Job Description: JOB TITLE:    TECHNICIAN SUPERVISORREPORTS TO:   MANAGERLOCATION:     PHNOM PENHSALARY RANGE: NEGOTIABLE1.  Responsible for the general maintenance and/or minor repairs to     the serviced apartments and grounds and to do related tasks as     required.2.  Maintain the physical condition of the building.3.  Routine inspection of general facilities and hands on     troubleshooting / replacement of parts for general facilities. 4.  Ensure the buildings has adequate heating, lighting and     ventilation. 5.  Does general maintenance and repairs such as paintings, patching     walls, plumbing facilities, electrical switches, and other     fixtures and equipment to ensure smooth operation. 6.  Maintain Preventive Maintenance Schedule and perform regular     Preventive Maintenance activities. 7. Monitor the stock level of     maintenance items, and review critical items to be kept as     spare. 8.  Conduct new equipment and machinery inspection before     commissioning.9.  Assist in the review and implementation of safety features for     the machines / equipment. 10.  Coordinate closely with Front Desk Supervisor and attend to     residents request promptly. 11. Update daily carry out works / maintenance records to Building     Manager.
Job Requirement: 1.  At least 3-5 years of work experienced as Technician Supervisor in     hotel / service apartments. 2.  Candidates must possess at least a Certificate in Mechanical &     Electrical & Plumbing Engineering related discipline.3.  Able to read and understand procedure and work instruction.4.  Able to perform basic MEP task.5.  Candidates with at least 3 years of related experience in trouble-     shooting and maintenance activities of mechanical and electronic     equipment will be given prior consideration.
Company Profile:
Founded as a family retail store in Phnom Penh in 1986, Y Chhe was incorporated in 2012 and has since expanded into a leading construction and building and materials supplier in Cambodia. Our quality construction and building materials have been used in many real estate and property projects in Cambodia, including hotels. Office and retails buildings, condominium, shopping centers, and boreys.

At Y Chhe, we are a people-orientated company; our business is not only providing the best for our customers but also our employees. We strive to be the benchmark for business standards in Cambodia, and spearhead the introduction of innovation and sustainability in our market.
